casebody.data:
In the Matter of Michael SLADE, Max Greif, and Reuben Fessler, Individually and as Copartners, Doing Business as Slade, Greif & Fessler, Bankrupts; M. H. Oberleder Co., Inc., Petitioner-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 18, 1924.) No. 234. Rosenthal <& Heermanee, of New York City (Charles K. Allen, of New York City, of counsel), for Petitioner-Appellant. Jacobson & Pollock, of New York City (Alexander Aaronson and Henry W. Pollock, both of New York City, of counsel), for bankrupts.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
